title: Rejuvenation bead ?
body:
Yes yes get the {{item:1006}} jokes out of the way...........

I have a few questions and need opinions also. 

Ok out of game in the item list it says this " + 50% base Health Regen" but in game it says something like " + 3hp per 5 secs" or something like that with the "50% " Quote.  
But I'v seen in an earlier patch that riot removed the 3hp per 5 secs regen and I'm pretty sure it says it was removed if you look up the item on wiki so is it still in game or not ?

I'm asking cause I suck now since Riot removed the old flask and the option to have potions with the flask I can't sustain in lane anymore and need help.  I'm a cs player who doesn't fight in lane unless its a Free trade but I get poked down so easily now.  
 
 Thank you and Have a Good One

replies.body:
I assure you the anal beads have the +50% base heath regen now and not the +3hp per 5 secs.

I recommend u use them on Heimerdinger (buy 2-3 of them) because he has the highest base HP regen ever from level 1 - 18. Your health regen will almost be the equivalent of a weak health potion passively in lane.
HP regen heim is secret cancer, please do not make it spread
I love it when I have to go top.
